notifications.too_far: You are too far from the business to submit a review.
notifications.review_submitted_fail: Failed to submit your review. Please try again later.

context_menu.open_reviews_description: Curious about others’ experiences? View existing impressions or share your own insights.
context_menu.read_reviews_description: Check out detailed opinions from fellow patrons to see what they liked—or didn’t.
context_menu.write_review_description: Have something to say? Leave your thoughts and a rating here!
context_menu.review_text_placeholder: Share up to 120 characters (optional). Keep it short!
context_menu.review_submit_description:
Submitted Review:

context_menu.no_reviews_found_description: Looks like no one has shared their thoughts yet. Be the first to leave a review!
context_menu.return_main_menu_description: Go back to the main reviews menu to see other options.
context_menu.already_submitted_review_description: You've already reviewed this business. You cannot submit another review right now.
context_menu.previous_page_description: Go to the previous set of reviews.
context_menu.next_page_description: Go to the next set of reviews.
